welcomePagesText.firstPageUnderText: Forget about the form of paper, all knowledge is in one app.
welcomePagesText.secondPageUnderText: Always keep in touch with your tutor and friend. Let's get connected.
welcomePagesText.thirdPageUnderText: Anywhere, anytime. The time is at your discretion, so study whenever you want.

signInLogIn.loginAdvice: Or use your email account login
signInLogIn.registerAdvice: Enter your details below & sign up
signInLogIn.incorrectEmailFill: Email is incorrect. Enter a valid email address
signInLogIn.emptyFields: The email and password fields are empty.
signInLogIn.emptyName: Incorrect or empty user name field
signInLogIn.goTroughLink: Go trough the link to validate your account
signInLogIn.afterLogIn: After, Log in to your account
signInLogIn.registerAgreement: By creating an account, you have to agree to our terms and conditions
